column2:
Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table: 

|        |       1    |    2    |    3     |    4    |    5    |
| music-genre |         |         |         |         |         |
| food  |         |         |         |         |         |
| game |         |         |         |         |         |
| house  |         |         |         |         |         |
| flower  |         |         |         |         |          

Puzzle: 
 
There 5 different types of food: onion, zucchini, carrot, radish, lettuce
The people prefer 5 different music-genres: indie, pop, techno, electronic, trance
House: colonial, victorian, gothic-revival, townhouse, futuristic
5 different games are played: go, domino, monopoly, mah-jongg, chess
The people grow 5 different varities of flowers: azalea, marigold, dahlia, orchid, bellflower

1. the fan of indie is the person eating onion
2. the fan of pop is the person who grows azalea
3. the person playing go is the person eating zucchini
4. the fan of techno is the person playing domino
5. the person eating zucchini is to the right of the person eating carrot
6. the colonial house is the person who grows bellflower
7. the victorian house is the person eating radish
8. the person playing monopoly is in the middle
9. the fan of electronic is on the far left
10. the gothic-revival house is on the left or right of the person who grows marigold
11. the victorian house is to the left or right of the person who grows orchid
12. the townhouse house is the person playing mah-jongg
13. the fan of trance is the futuristic house
14. the fan of electronic is to the left or right of the person eating lettuce. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.

Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table: 

|        |       1    |    2    |    3     |    4    |    5    |

| pet  |         |         |         |         |          

Puzzle: 
 
There are 5 different favourite colors: red, green, ivory, yellow, blue
There are 5 different nationalities: english, spanish, ukranian, norwegian, japanese
5 different brands of cigars are smoked: old-gold, kools, chesterfields, lucky-strike, parliaments
The people prefer 5 different types of sport: baseball, biathlon, weightlifting, handball, parkour
5 different pets are kept: dog, fox, zebra, horse, snails

1. the english is the person who likes red
2. the spanish is the owner of the dog
3. the person who's sport is baseball is the person who likes green
4. the ukranian is the person who's sport is biathlon
5. the person who likes green is to the right of the person who likes ivory
6. the old-gold-smoker is the owner of the snails
7. the kools-smoker is the person who likes yellow
8. the person who's sport is weightlifting is in the middle
9. the norwegian is on the far left
10. the chesterfields-smoker is on the left or right of the owner of the fox
11. the kools-smoker is to the left or right of the owner of the horse
12. the lucky-strike-smoker is the person who's sport is handball
13. the japanese is the parliaments-smoker
14. the norwegian is to the left or right of the person who likes blue. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.

Puzzle: 
 
There are 5 different favourite colors: red, green, ivory, yellow, blue
City: berlin, nizza, marseilles, london, colone
5 different brands of cigars are smoked: old-gold, kools, chesterfields, lucky-strike, parliaments
The people have 5 different jobs:  architect, dancer, social-worker, project-manager, electrician
5 different pets are kept: dog, fox, zebra, horse, snails

1. the person traveling to berlin is the person who likes red
2. the person traveling to nizza is the owner of the dog
3. the architect is the person who likes green
4. the person traveling to marseilles is the dancer
5. the person who likes green is to the right of the person who likes ivory
6. the old-gold-smoker is the owner of the snails
7. the kools-smoker is the person who likes yellow
8. the social-worker is in the middle
9. the person traveling to london is on the far left
10. the chesterfields-smoker is on the left or right of the owner of the fox
11. the kools-smoker is to the left or right of the owner of the horse
12. the lucky-strike-smoker is the project-manager
13. the person traveling to colone is the parliaments-smoker
14. the person traveling to london is to the left or right of the person who likes blue. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.

Puzzle: 
 
The people use 5 different means of transport: motorbike, bus, ship, subway, quad-bike
There are 5 different nationalities: english, spanish, ukranian, norwegian, japanese
The people prefer 5 different music-genres: hip-hop, quad-bikes, trance, d&b, rock
There are 5 different favourite beverages: coffee, tea, milk, orange-juice, water
The people have 5 different hobbies: singing, photography, board-games, fishing, writing

1. the english is the person driving the motorbike
2. the spanish is the person who's hobby is singing
3. the person drinking coffee is the person driving the bus
4. the ukranian is the person drinking tea
5. the person driving the bus is to the right of the person driving the ship
6. the fan of hip-hop is the person who's hobby is writing
7. the fan of quad-bikes is the person driving the subway
8. the person drinking milk is in the middle
9. the norwegian is on the far left
10. the fan of trance is on the left or right of the person who's hobby is photography
11. the fan of quad-bikes is to the left or right of the person who's hobby is fishing
12. the fan of d&b is the person drinking orange-juice
13. the japanese is the fan of rock
14. the norwegian is to the left or right of the person driving the quad-bike. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.

Puzzle: 
 
The people perfer 5 different movie-genres: mystery, horror, adventure, western, drama
The people prefer 5 different types of sport: lacrosse, water-polo, snowboarding, cricket, biathlon
There 5 different types of food: cranberry, spinach, cauliflower, grapes, lime
There are 5 different favourite beverages: coffee, tea, milk, orange-juice, water
The people have 5 different jobs:  social-worker, chef, pilot, bartender, engineer

1. the person who's sport is lacrosse is the person watching mystery movies
2. the person who's sport is water-polo is the social-worker
3. the person drinking coffee is the person watching horror movies
4. the person who's sport is snowboarding is the person drinking tea
5. the person watching horror movies is to the right of the person watching adventure movies
6. the person eating cranberry is the engineer
7. the person eating spinach is the person watching western movies
8. the person drinking milk is in the middle
9. the person who's sport is cricket is on the far left
10. the person eating cauliflower is on the left or right of the chef
11. the person eating spinach is to the left or right of the bartender
12. the person eating grapes is the person drinking orange-juice
13. the person who's sport is biathlon is the person eating lime
14. the person who's sport is cricket is to the left or right of the person watching drama movies. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.
